body: Random question: What was your favorite #childhood #cartoon? I was obsessed with 'Adventure Pals' growing up. #nostalgia

comments.body: Oh man, for me it was definitely 'Cosmic Explorers'! I used to watch it every Saturday morning. That theme song still lives rent-free in my head.
@22334 YES! The theme song was so catchy! And remember the episode where they got stuck on the ice planet? Classic.
@11223 Haha, I do! That was the one where the captain’s robot pet saved the day, right?
Mine was 'Jungle Warriors.' I was obsessed with the animal characters, especially the cheetah who could run super fast.
@33445 That one was cool! The animation style was pretty unique, too. I remember trying to draw the characters in my sketchbook!
No one’s mentioned 'Robot Squadron'? I loved that show! It was all about teamwork, and the gadgets they used were so fun.
@44556 Wow, how could I forget? I had a bunch of those action figures. The robot with the extendable arms was my favorite.
I have to go with 'Mystery Kids.' It had such a cool mix of mystery and humor. I still remember trying to solve the cases before the characters did!
@55667 Haha, same! I always thought I’d be great at solving mysteries because of that show.
